page.title: 13The Reverend John Schild
page.content: John, who is vicar of Christ Church, Little Heath, is married to Elizabeth, and has two children - Andrew aged eighten years (twin sister Debra died in 1982) and Rebecca aged fifteen years. They have been in the locality for eight years and John enjoys his work very much. He was born in Sheffield, although his parents were Cockneys. John then went on to University and was a designer of scientific instruments before entering the Ministry. He did this so that he might work with "people rather than things." John especially enjoys encouraging people to worship in a relaxed and happy way and visiting Little Heath School - and playing with computers !
